ext_weather.shortForecast: Partly Sunny then Chance Rain And Snow
ext_weather.detailedForecast: A chance of rain and snow after noon. Partly sunny, with a high near 41. North wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.
